title: Ep. 88 - Jim Rogers Unplugged
itunes:title: Jim Rogers Unplugged
description: Legendary investor, author and billionaire Jim Rogers talks about the destruction of the dollar, the one commodity he's buying right now, and his favorite short. Jim also talks about investing in one of the most unstable countries in the world.
content:encoded: Legendary investor, author and billionaire Jim Rogers talks about the destruction of the dollar, the one commodity he's buying right now, and his favorite short. Jim also talks about investing in one of the most unstable countries in the world.
